<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Expects LoopAccessInfo, Loop, LoopInfo, DominatorTree as input.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It uses runtime check provided by the user. If \\p UseLAIChecks is true,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// we will retain the default checks made by LAI. Otherwise, construct an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// object having no checks and we expect the user to add them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#ab781d1d60b8dba236c33dba9ae54e087">LoopVersioning</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopaccessinfo">LoopAccessInfo</a> &amp;LAI,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &#42;DT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &#42;SE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Performs the CFG manipulation part of versioning the loop including</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the DominatorTree and LoopInfo updates.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The loop that was used to construct the class will be the &quot;versioned&quot; loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// i.e. the loop that will receive control if all the memchecks pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This allows the loop transform pass to operate on the same loop regardless</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// of whether versioning was necessary or not:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///    for each loop L:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        analyze L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        if versioning is necessary version L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///        transform L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#a65b5f9f4aa48ceb121d65679d8b1a689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#a65b5f9f4aa48ceb121d65679d8b1a689">versionLoop</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning/#a65b5f9f4aa48ceb121d65679d8b1a689">versionLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6880d6c7da94499220b6d7dfcc3c88d4">findDefsUsedOutsideOfLoop</a>(VersionedLoop)); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Same but if the client has already precomputed the set of values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used outside the loop, this API will allows passing that.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the versioned loop.  Control flows here if pointers in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// loop don&#39;t alias (i.e. all memchecks passed).  (This loop is actually the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the fall-back loop.  Control flows here if pointers in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Maps a pointer to the pointer checking group that the pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// belongs to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;const Value &#42;, const RuntimeCheckingPtrGroup &#42;&gt; PtrToGroup;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The alias scope corresponding to a pointer checking group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;const RuntimeCheckingPtrGroup &#42;, MDNode &#42;&gt; GroupToScope;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The list of alias scopes that a pointer checking group can&#39;t alias.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;const RuntimeCheckingPtrGroup &#42;, MDNode &#42;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      GroupToNonAliasingScopeList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Analyses used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopAccessInfo &amp;LAI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  LoopInfo &#42;LI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DominatorTree &#42;DT;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ScalarEvolution &#42;SE;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Expose LoopVersioning as a pass.  Currently this is only used for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unit-testing.  It adds all memchecks necessary to remove all may-aliasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// array accesses from the loop.</span></CodeLine>
